attributes.action: Enshrine DFID spending commitments in law
attributes.additional_details:
This e-petition calls on the Government to enshrine the 0.7% GNI spending commitment in law.

UK poverty cannot be compared to the poverty in some of the world's poorest and least developed countries.

I am tired of seeing the DFID section flooded with anti-aid petitions. It's time to defend international development.
